title: Buttercup
creator_credit: Dimension Films and Robert Leland Brown
brief_description: This film presents without commentary an ecological story about a buttercup which floats down a mountain stream and ends up being swallowed in polluted industrial waters. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
